description: Try our easy to follow Mediterranean Tart recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury pie & tart,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Roast,Seafood free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Zucchini,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Tomato,Asparagus,Low fat
name: Mediterranean Tart Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red capsicum, deseeded and sliced into strips
3 zucchini, halved lengthways and cut crossways into 2cm-thick slices

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Combine zucchini with capsicum, onion and garlic on tray and spray with oil. Cook for 10 minutes or until just softened. Reduce oven to 200°C.

Meanwhile, grease a 21x30cm shallow baking pan. Lightly spray each filo sheet with oil and layer on top of each other. Place in pan, spread lentils over pastry and top with roast vegetables and tomato. Bake for 15 minutes or until pastry is golden. Crumble feta over tart. Top with basil leaves and pine nuts. Slice and serve with asparagus.
